title: Assumption Ledger
description: A structured ledger of assumptions explicitly declared when information is incomplete or uncertain.

ledger_id.description: Unique identifier for this assumption ledger.

timestamp.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when assumptions were logged.

agent_identity.description: Agent or human declaring the assumptions (e.g., Skynet / ElmatadorZ).

context.description: Situation or decision context requiring assumptions.

reason.description: Why this assumption was necessary (missing data, ambiguity, time constraint).

uncertainty_level.description: Estimated uncertainty (0 = very certain, 1 = highly uncertain).

validation_path.description: How this assumption could be tested, validated, or falsified.

status.description: Current validation status of the assumption.

confidence_impact.description: Explanation of how these assumptions affect overall decision confidence.

trigger_events.description: Events that require immediate assumption review.

review_policy.description: Policy for revisiting and updating assumptions.
